attributes.title: what is DIS hunny?
attributes.review: I have nothing good to say about this app. First off it is organized terribly. Most trump supporters are boomers so you would think this app would be very easy to use but it’s not which is concerning. It also constantly crashes and is very slow. I don’t know who coded this or designed it but they should be fired. With all that money you’d think Trump could hire someone with any amount of skill to spew his propaganda. Overall this app is a waste of space on your device.

attributes.title: DO NOT TRUST THIS MAN WITH YOUR HEART
attributes.review: Being a good conservative Christian white man I got this app to look at the lord and savior Donald trump himself, but all of a sudden he came out of the app all human. So me and Donny spent the day together and the night (if you know what I mean 🍆😫) but the next morning I woke up in bed alone and unsatisfied. I cried alone for days wishing he and his little (and I mean tiny) man 🍆 would come back but he never did, so I deleted the app and now I am a satanist liberal who is voting for Biden in November just like reasonable person should.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: So let’s start off with the bad stuff about this app so this took about a week to download and it kept bringing up a orange for some reason I was so confused idk if it cursed or something because after seeing the face I had bad luck all day this is the worst app ever don’t recommend only if u want to be cursed for a day and it played this horrible music and it literally brought all the cows to my house like ugh anyways I hate this app I’m warning you don’t do it .

attributes.title: TERRIBLE app
attributes.review: NEVER download this app. I was so excited to see this in the app store because i am a huge trump supporter. but this app is disgusting. full of propaganda and fake news. if you truly support trump, don’t waste your time on this. sign up for his text messaging list instead. it kept glitching and taking me back to my lockscreen. my phone got very hot while using it and it even deleted itself! i’m outraged that a man as smart as trump could let his administration make such a horrible app
